backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, membership tiers, and user profile storage with admin‑gated CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and tests with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing UI components, pages, and hooks across the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring routing, theming, authentication, profile setup, and notification banner.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Simple UI screen informing unauthorized users and offering a return‑home button.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityMana: Admin panel UI for creating 30‑minute time slots and toggling availability and live status using backend query hooks.
frontend/src/components/BookingExtension: UI panel allowing staff to extend a booking by 15 minutes using a booking ID with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/BusinessContactI: Form for viewing and updating business contact details fetched from and saved to the backend.
frontend/src/components/InviteAdminPanel: Panel for inviting new admins via email, messaging apps, or link sharing, with device detection and invitation tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout with navigation, authentication handling, admin access check, and a responsive header and menu.
frontend/src/components/LoyaltyPointsSet: Settings UI to enable or disable awarding loyalty points for promotional bookings with save functionality.
frontend/src/components/MembershipManage: CRUD interface for membership tiers allowing creation, editing, and deletion of tier data with validation.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBann: Displays the most recent unread notification and allows dismissing it while marking it as read.
frontend/src/components/NotificationCent: Provides a full notification panel with reading, deleting, and clearing notifications using a slide-out sheet.
frontend/src/components/PointsCategories: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of points categories with form handling and validation.
frontend/src/components/ProductManagemen: Form for adding new products with validation and submission to backend via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile setup, capturing name and email and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigPane: Configures Stripe payment settings by submitting a secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/VenueInfoPanel.t: Form for updating venue details such as name, location, and operating hours via backend mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, persisted identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend data such as profiles, memberships, points, bookings, and other admin-controlled resources.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark mode CSS variables for a cricket-themed UI along with global styles and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin interface with tabbed panels for managing settings, requiring authenticated admin access.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Displays available time slots, lets authenticated users book sessions, and awards loyalty points based on membership and category multipliers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, features list, and top reviews with navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays player rankings with a podium for top three and a full leaderboard list fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Shows membership details, tiers, and rewards, with checkout flow for upgrades and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Informs the user that their payment was cancelled and provides navigation back to store or home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirms a successful payment and offers links to view orders or return home.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Authenticated user profile page showing personal info, membership, bookings, and orders in tabbed sections.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsPage.tsx: Shows user reviews and provides an authenticated form for submitting new ratings and comments.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Renders the store page with product listing, cart management, and checkout session creation using hooks for products and authentication. Handles adding items, updating quantities, computing totals, and initiating checkout.
frontend/src/pages/VenueInfoPage.tsx: Displays venue details, contact information, FAQs, and rules using fetched venue and business data with fallback defaults. Includes structured cards and accordion sections for user-facing info.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes related to booking, admin features, and contact information management.
